status.name: Open

fields.description:
h3. Steps to Reproduce
Please check the problem and my solution in this URL:
http://developer.appcelerator.com/question/152821/titanium-cli-command-line-option-to-pass-key-password-missing#answer-265287

You must add this support since deploying is useful daily sometimes.
Thanks

h3. Actual Result
If your keystore has keypass, Titanium doesn't support it and it's waiting at the last line ('â€¦ might take some time') forever.
If you stop the build, you can see the 'error' message asking for missing keypass password.

h3. Expected Result
All built-in without user manual terminal executing.
fields.summary: Android: Lack of keypass support when distributing to Android Market
